summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 1.7°C) and outside temperature (down 1.6°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 5%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 6 mbar), light levels (up 3006 lux), cloud levels (up 439 m), and rainfall (up 0.2 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1373 m), light levels (up 5357 lux), and rainfall (down 0.1 mm) when compared to today.

Today’s cloud levels is 439.2m lower than yesterday, 974.4m lower than past week, 1373.3m lower than past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 860m and a high of 3110m, averaging 1434.1m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: Expect mostly clear skies with high cloud.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, you’ll experience intense stickiness in the air. Drizzle or light rain possible, mostly clear skies with high cloud, and some sunny spells will occur. The weather may be change rapidly and become worse.
